extraordinario, tanto su jugabilidad como su historia lo hacen en mi opinion uno de los mejores juegos de la historia y el mejor para mi, por mucho tiempo he sido de fan de la saga bioshock y sus dos primeras entregas son de lo mejor pero infinite tiene una historia que te atrapa y el final es que no te lo esperas, recomendado al 100%, si te gusta una buena historia con un nivel de dificultad mayor de lo normal este es tu juego saludos y espero verte en columbia.

Jogo ultra super estimado, trata de um assunto interessantissimo (multiverso e viagens no tempo) de forma totalmente tosca e sem empolgação alguma, não instiga nem alimenta o imaginario para a possibilidade da forma que um SOMA faz por exemplo. Um FPS Arcade com pretensões filosóficas bem mal contadas no fim das contas. Sem emoção nenhuma.

Nope

我是趁着降价买的这款游戏，不得不说，画面和音乐和剧情都极其完美，不过还是不支持简体中文，但是有繁体也可以看懂。这个游戏的剧情理解有点难度，收音机是非常好的理解剧情的道具，不过汉化没把字幕做出来。靠着我的渣英语水平也只能听的一知半解
我还是玩到中后半段才发现我没开字幕，真石乐志。不多说游戏是好游戏。但是，伊丽莎白赛高
Une histoire Remplis d'un mystere poignant et accrocheur. Une de mes jeux préféré et je le recommende Fortement ! Remember that there's always Constants and Variables.... ;)
对不起，伊丽莎白已经是我老婆了

The story and world that this game builds is one of the most intresting and intricate that I have ever seen. The game is challenging if you want it to be and the difficulty scales perfectly. I got the game during the summer sale at a fraction of the cost but the game is absolutely worth the full price, as is the DLC.

值此steam账户拥有一年之际，前来评价我的第一款steam游戏/白金游戏

80小时正式白金

9/10 无限条道路在首尾相接成环的时候，就是唯一的过去和未来

生化奇兵系列，其中的无限一作，作为2013年年度游戏最有希望的获得者，却被另两款时代之作GTA5和美国末日的风头盖过，随着开发工作室的解散，这个游戏系列正式宣告结束。无限个未来的可能此时收束为一，划向世间万物的共同命运——彻底消亡

但每个玩家的游戏体验都是唯一的，所以，每个玩家都拥有一个独一无二的生化奇兵世界，一个独一无二的伊丽莎白。
在游戏的最后，你得知了她们共同的宿命——通过杀死你的方式，自我毁灭，故事所有的可能随着你与她的死亡归零，留存唯一一个本应在几十年前就存在的故事。

销魂城，哥伦比亚，还有里面无数显赫一时的大大小小的权贵豪绅，都是他们自己欲望的奴隶，最终皆为自己的欲望所埋葬。光鲜亮丽的城池，投机倒把的大众，都与他们牢牢捆绑在一起，一同做了陪葬品。

所幸，本该纯真的最后回归了纯真，本该自由的也获得了自由

随着海葬dlc的发售，生化奇兵的世界观正式闭合成环

无限个可能的未来彻底归一，戛然而止

唯有曾经存在过无限个未来的时候，依旧流存于我们这些玩家们的记忆中，由我们的讲述代代相传

那是一切存在过的证明
初见伊丽莎白就被迷上了，可惜电脑不给力，等更新配置之后一定要用特效全开玩爆

A Masterpiece of storytelling.

From the way the game plays out to the system mechanics themselves, there is nothing "casual" about Bioshock Infinite.
I have never played on "normal" (started on hard), and boy it can get brutal at times.

However, sad as it is, you don't really play this game for the FPS mechanics - the story, with the depth of an ocean is what differentiates the franchise from other FPS single-player games.

Definately a must play for any player that enjoys atmospheric FPS games - and enjoys deep, mature storytelling.
8.5/10

Bioshock Infinite: Una digna secuela que perfecciona la narrativa, pero mediocriza la jugabilidad. 

-Historia: 9/10 (Gran crítica a la teocracía que brilla por las representaciones alegóricas / Fundamentos filosóficos y psicológicos que se basan principalmente en la teoria del "multiverso")

-Jugabilidad: 7/10 (Muy simplificada en contraste con entregas anteriores / Lineal / En diversas ocasiones se siente inútil / Buen manejo de controles / Posee un uso del escenario "promedio" / Restricción de armas) 

-Gráficos: 8/10 (Columbia se sigue viendo hermosa, lo que sí ha envejecido son los modelos de los enemigos y personajes secundarios) 

-Atmósfera: 6/10 (A pesar de la belleza de los escenarios, estos se sienten "Planos" debido a la naturaleza "lineal" del título / No llegan a la altura de la claustrofobia generada por los primeros Bioshock / El sonido es bueno, pero no excelente / Los escenarios se sienten bastante repetitivos) 

----CALIFICACIÓN FINAL: 8 (Sí eres fan de la franquicia, LO DEBES TENER. Si no, cómpralo en rebajas)

Mind Blowing.

If you need a challenge, then try it at a higher difficulty level. Certainly a game worth playing through! Get it and enjoy!

Playing this game through the first time on Xbox 360 days blew my mind, one of the best twists and mind blowing endings in video games within the last 10 years. Replaying this again on PC, still it blows my mind and honestly looks better on PC than 360/ps3. Bioshock 1 will always hold a place in my heart but this game is just thought provoking, american history rooted (many themes come from 1900's) and the DLC is the final stories in the bioshock saga (till they decide to make another one) easily the best one out of the three bioshock games. Amazing story, solid gun fights and a game/ending that you will never forget. A true steampunk masterpiece. 9/10

Wow! Playing this game for the first time and if I might add it is also my first Bioshock game. Artwork is amazing and the gameplay is very easy to pick up and fun. It drops you in the game not really telling you much and I love it, plus the storyline is very good as well, despite me not even beating the game yet. It reminds me a bit of Fallout 4 with the combat, which is very fun. Sound effects are very pleasing to the ears and the visuals are STUNNING. I am running this on a laptop with low settings and I literally couldn't tell when I started up the game that the graphics were on low. Being an old game though it has it's flaws, a term that I am using losely, and that is mostly in the animation. It seems as if none of the game is in motion capture but just strictly computer animation, which is fine by me but for others it may prove to be unimmersive. Another weird nit pick of mine is the animation for the mouths, the characters when the say anything with "oh" their mouth looks really weird and contorts in a weird way but it's not anything big. Anyway, overall I personally give this game a 8/10, only because I have not personally finished it.
剧情（萝莉）向游戏，值得一玩

It's a great game with smooth cartoony graphics, good fighting sequence and mechanics, a variety of weapons, and a captivating plot! There was so many details if you are diving into the lore, but also some great combats if you are just aiming for the adrenoline rush! 
The end plot and lore are apparently tied up with other Bioshock games in the franchise, which I haven't played, so I was quite in the dark during the game regarding the lore. The ending was definitely confusing for me! The characters were also heavily involved in the lore. 
If I had the chance, I would definitely replay this game to better understand the plot and lore! 
Surely recommend!

Najlepszy fabularny FPS w historii. Miażdżący klimatem prequel genialnej serii. DLC Burial at Sea to mistrzostwo świata.

（第一次给游戏的测评，剧透警告!!!!!!!!!!!!!）
           2018年七月一日入手到今天，在工作室的休息时间中通关了这部神作，虽然都有那么多人叫它神作了，但我还是想从自己的角度给它一个定档吧。
       游戏的开头界面类似于七八十年代的街风，霓虹灯背景的创意似乎还算是新颖（毕竟是2013年的游戏），但其赛博朋克的风格已经显露的很明显。但我却第一时间犹豫了，因为其悠扬断续的爵士乐背景很难让我想象其战斗场面（本人对这方面也不乏挑剔）。此刻我的脑海已经浮现出退款的场景了，毕竟饭钱哈哈哈.......好了接下来就是进入游戏了........暴风雨？划船？灯塔？一具被枪杀的尸体？什么玩意？一时我就摸不着头脑了，然后沿着游戏路线坐上了一个十九世纪的火箭来到了.......天空之城！？对的，天空之城。一时我就忘了退款是什么，只是为眼前这光，这水，这城叹为观止。真的，真的很美，虽然没有一些游戏的自由能看日出什么的，但是目光所及之处都是一派和谐繁荣（或许这就是社会主义的理想世界）。然后找路找路.........最后找到了一个叫伊丽莎白的傻白甜，卧槽，叫我跟她跳舞（不好意思日漫看多了不喜欢你这种的啊.........真香！）。没错，我的任务就是带你去浪漫的巴黎（其实是拿她抵债），欺骗对一个女孩来说会不会太残忍了，但还是得玩啊。
       果然故事没有那么简单，离途之路的艰辛便是游戏性所在，慢慢的你会发现你已经离不开这个傻白甜了，她从不会拖你后腿，在你专心战斗时她会乖乖跟在你身后好好躲着，在你弹尽血空时（不仅仅是射击还有很棒的异能设定），她总能给你需要的（这个人物战斗设定真的很棒）让你战斗到最后，此刻尽管享受着有她陪伴的战斗呢，退款是啥？？？其中有一段剧情伊丽莎白被抓走，所以只能靠自己去寻找她，此时这就变成了一个恐怖游戏（一次返头尖叫杀着实吓得在宿舍一个人的我一愣一愣的），没了伊丽莎白，似乎就有一种玩不下去的感觉哈哈哈。
        飞艇坠毁，穿梭裂境，对抗革命，寻找真相，家事之谜，剧情一条紧扣一条，虽然一直被牵着跑，但是你会沉浸并乐在其中（假如你非常看重游戏自由度就算了吧），伊丽莎白也会在战火和人性中逐渐成熟，开始逐渐看清这个世界（此刻我想大多数人已经爱上这个傻白甜了）。最后矛头直指他所谓的养父，似乎终结他就能结束这一切。
       果然在这种充满变量与常量的世界线下，现在将来过去也不过是语法而已。当结尾一次又一次的回到故事的开头，听男女卢特斯说着隐晦的话语，离开船只，爬上梯子，进入灯塔，开门，再次开门，似乎心中已经知道男主布克和伊丽莎白的关系并没有那么简单。
       果然，伊丽莎白原名叫安娜，她的父亲是男主布克.......（心里是一阵又一阵的草泥马惊呼）。当布克知道伊丽莎白断掉的小拇指是因为自己时，他的心中只有对她的愧疚和对救赎的渴望，唯一的办法就是在摇篮中扼杀康姆斯托克。当他走到最后一扇门时，伊丽莎白质问到他是否确定，伊丽莎白似乎早就看到了未来。当然，为了女儿他义无反顾。开门，康姆斯托克的本质是接受过洗礼建立宗教的布克，所以，布克选择了让各个世界线的伊丽莎白一起淹死他。之后，伊丽莎白一个接着一个消失，留下了布克的尸体在水中。（黑屏）结尾制作。
         结尾制作后布克于1893年10月8日醒来，叫着安娜的名字推开了她房间的门。（落泪，饭钱是什么？伊丽莎白我可以邀请你再跳一支舞吗？）
Excelente juego, muy bien ambientado, buena historia y jugabilidad. Uno de mis favoritos.

I'll begin by saying that while I've played plenty of games (not nearly enough imho), I've never once written a review of one. Not because of lack of enjoyment, but rather because there was nothing more to add that hadn't already been said by other players. Bioshock Infinite made me break this pattern.

This game is as close to perfection as any game could ever come. The story is so good and well thought out that I wish it were a book, the gameplay has its flaws, but I find that most games do, it has stunning views and a superb design, albeit quite creepy in the later stages. Of course, I can't talk about this game's strong points without mentioning the incredible character development. One minute I'm rooting for a character, the next I want to send a bunch of killer crows their way.

Having just finished this game, I am perhaps a bit enthusiastic about it. But you will be too. It's the kind of game that you just want to keep playing, not (only) because of that area you can't seem to kill your way through, but because you need to know what happens next. I wish more games were like this. Though I would certainly be a lot poorer.
Сюжет и эстетика хороши, механика по нынешним временам не очень. И не бодрое крошилово с кучей оружия, патронов и т.п. и не шутер с укрытиями, во втором эпизоде дополнений вообще недо-стеллс.

I never fell inlove with a game character this much before. you could tell that they put a lot of work on making elizabeth the best a.i. with how she interact with her sorroundings to assisting you with combat and picking locks it's like you have a really useful companion who got your back.
Игра просто супер, жаль что продолжения нет... Обидно

I like it.

La ciudad de Columbia es realmente increible, un deleite tanto visual como mecánico, porque una de las cosas más destacables del juego es saltar en la cara de los enemigos desde los aerocarriles mientras te desplazas entre la hermosa arquitectura de los edificios flotantes.

Con personajes bien diseñados y llenos de carisma que se comen cada momento, y una historia que nos muestra la verdadera cara de esta utopía a medida de que nos sumerge en su mundo...

Mi pregunta es: ¿Por qué no hay más de estos dos últimos factores? La trama y quienes la rodean son tan increiblemente buenos, que llega un punto en el que dar tantos tiros deja de tener sentido, y en cierto modo, se vuelve molesto, un obstáculo innecesario para esa hermosa narrativa.

(1, 2 본편은 안 해봤습니다)  도우미 엘리자베스와 함께 하는 색다른 시스템.... 아이템 소환(?)도 생소한 매력이 있고 연출도 좋다. 특히 초반부 아름답고 몽환적인 하늘도시 풍경도 멋지고.  다만 전투가 다소 난잡하고 그래픽 설정을 바꿔봐도 뭔가 어두침침해서 잡탕으로 뒤섞여 싸우는  느낌.... 그래도 졸졸 따라다니며 서포트해주는 엘리자베스 귀여워서 GOOD
